resources.string:
Hi, my name is Fabricio. 

I am MSc. in Computer Science from UFCG. 

I participated for three years in the Brazil-IP project. 

I am working at Virtus in projects that it has LG with a partner. 
For the last two years, I have been work with Angular, NodeJS, Electron. 
I have experience with microelectronics and embedded systems. 

And even less sometimes, I actually catch something. 

Once, when I was camping in Canada, and very hungry, I even caught a large salmon with my hands. 

I'll be happy to teach you how to make your own aquarium. 
You should ask someone else about fishing, though.
